name: Hl7VSOccurrenceSpan
title: hl7VS-occurrenceSpan
description: Concepts drawn from the National Uniform Billing Committee (NUBC) code that identifies an event that relates to the payment of a claim.  Used in Version 2 messaging in the Occurrence Span Code and Date (OSP) value.
